title: Ranma ½ Super
synopsis: Super OVA 1: Based on a story from vol. 27 of the manga, Shampoo and Ukyo arrange to travel to a cave that is legendary for breaking up couples. They hope they will cause Ranma and Akane to break-up and Shampoo hopes to ditch Mousse the same way.
characters: ['Saotome, Ranma', 'Tendou, Akane', 'Hibiki, Ryouga', 'Shampoo', 'Kuonji, Ukyo', 'Tendou, Nabiki', 'Saotome, Genma', 'Kuno, Tatewaki', 'Tendou, Kasumi', 'Mousse']
